name: Taxi Transport City Sim
description:
Taxi Transport City Sim!!!
To start with your gaming missions, you need to observe your taxi radio time by time. When any request will come, you will be notified in this super luxury city taxi car drive: simulation game. Accept the request to start the mission. Firstly you have to look for the pick-up destination. Drive very carefully to the pick-up location. Follow traffic signals on the way in this crazy taxi game.
Features:
Realistic 3D graphics
Free mode to explore the city
Real in-game sound effects
Follow the traffic laws and rules
You will be charged with heavy fines on breaking traffic laws
